alert.note: Alert for Baker County; Malheur County (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 19 at 4:13PM PDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Baker and north central Malheur Counties through 515 PM PDT... At 413 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Haines to near Salisbury to Baldy Mountain. Movement was northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Baker City, Bridgeport, Flagstaff Hill and Dooley Summit around 420 PM PDT. Pleasant Valley around 430 PM PDT. Keating around 440 PM PDT. Love Reservoir around 450 PM PDT. Gover Reservoir around 500 PM PDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
